# samplingFrequency

**Instance Property**

The frequency of the accelerometer data recording in hertz.

## Declaration

```swift
var samplingFrequency: Measurement<UnitFrequency> { get }
```

## Accessing accelerometer data

- **nanosecondsSinceStart**: The time in nanoseconds since the start of the accelerometer data recording.
- **x**: The x-axis acceleration in G’s (gravitational force).
- **y**: The y-axis acceleration in G’s (gravitational force).
- **z**: The z-axis acceleration in G’s (gravitational force).
